description:
We know what's happening in the world, and we know how information is being blocked (don't want to say (the ""word"" because this post will be ""checked for facts""). Bottom line is we have no idea how long before the social media channels completely block communication.
.
In the interest of wishing to facilitate and insure continued communication and open dialogue, please consider joining our new Advanced Medicine channel using Telegram. It's the middle link you see below me in the video. But all 3 of the links will get you into our system. However, the middle link is to the new channel. You can also click on the link in my profile to access the new Telegram channel which is www.linktr.ee/drbuttar
.
Hope you join us so we can remain in touch in case of something like, oh, I don't know, they SHUT MY SOIAL MEDIA CHANNELS DOWN!ðŸ˜‚ Please pass this video on and ask others to share if my message resonates with you.
.
Also, if you're a physician, we are having a webinar for health care providers only. But you have to be registered as a health care provider. To register, just click on the link in the profile and follow the path to the Resources and Tools.
.
